mapper.select: SELECT r.resid_no AS residNo, r.resid_name AS residName, r.host_user_no AS hostUserNo, r.resid_description AS residDescription, r.resid_address AS residAddress, r.resid_type AS residType, r.resid_date AS residDate, rp.photo_url01 AS photoUrl01, rp.photo_url02 AS photoUrl02, rp.photo_url03 AS photoUrl03, rp.photo_url04 AS photoUrl04, rp.photo_url05 AS photoUrl05, rp.photo_url06 AS photoUrl06, rp.photo_url07 AS photoUrl07, rp.photo_url08 AS photoUrl08, rp.photo_url09 AS photoUrl09, rp.photo_url10 AS photoUrl10, rr.room_no AS roomNo, rr.room_name AS roomName, rr.price_per_night AS pricePerNight, re.discount_rate AS discountRate, re.discounted_price AS discountedPrice, re.checkin_date AS checkinDate, re.checkout_date AS checkoutDate FROM residence r LEFT JOIN property_photos rp ON r.resid_no = rp.resid_no LEFT JOIN residence_rooms rr ON r.resid_no = rr.resid_no LEFT JOIN reservations re ON rr.room_no = re.room_no
SELECT * FROM residence WHERE (#{showSoldOut} = TRUE OR sold_out = FALSE);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO residence (resid_name, host_user_no, resid_description, resid_address, resid_type, nx, ny, regId, regIdTemp) VALUES (#{residName}, #{hostUserNo}, #{residDescription}, #{residAddress}, #{residType}, #{nx}, #{ny}, #{regId}, #{regIdTemp})
mapper.update: UPDATE residence SET resid_name = #{residName}, host_user_no = #{hostUserNo}, resid_description = #{residDescription}, resid_address = #{residAddress}, resid_type = #{residType} WHERE resid_no = #{residNo}
mapper.select: SELECT r.resid_no AS residNo, r.resid_name AS residName, r.host_user_no AS hostUserNo, r.resid_description AS residDescription, r.resid_address AS residAddress, r.resid_type AS residType, r.resid_date AS residDate, r.nx AS nx, r.ny AS ny, r.regId AS regId, r.regIdTemp AS regIdTemp, rp.photo_url01 AS photoUrl01, rr.room_no AS roomNo, rr.room_name AS roomName, rr.price_per_night AS pricePerNight, re.discount_rate AS discountRate, re.discounted_price AS discountedPrice, re.checkin_date AS checkinDate, re.checkout_date AS checkoutDate FROM residence r LEFT JOIN property_photos rp ON r.resid_no = rp.resid_no LEFT JOIN residence_rooms rr ON r.resid_no = rr.resid_no LEFT JOIN reservations re ON r.resid_no = re.room_no WHERE r.resid_no = #{residNo}
